title: How can I adjust the screen brightness?
answer:
On the home screen, touch Settings > Display > Brightness. Select Automatic brightness or manually drag the brightness slider. 

 In the notification panel, touch the brightness icon to adjust the screen brightness. 

 To have your phone automatically adjust the screen brightness, touch the brightness icon until ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111159) is displayed. 

 [The following brightness icons indicate brightness levels from low to high: ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111160) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111161) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111162)]()
